The Bordeaux Fine Wine Market The region of Bordeaux is considered a perfect wine growing area due to its unique landscape, temperature and latitude. The supply of Bordeaux fine wine is limited as only a small quantity of fine wines are produced each year. The supply is further decreased as wines are purchased & consumed daily around the world. In the meantime, the quality of fine wines improves with the ageing process and so the value increases. Fine wine is a luxury product and as such its demand is constantly growing globally. Due to increasing wealth, there is an expanding number of people investing in and drinking fine wines. Demand is also growing due to the increasing interest from the emerging markets, in particular, the Asian market since the abolition of the wine duty by the Hong Kong government in February 2008.

The Team Our CEO worked as a lawyer at a city law firm for over 4 years where he developed a personal passion for fine wine. In 2006, he set up and managed the HR Private Fund for some of his more established clients, investing in fine wine from Bordeaux, with the sole objective of ensuring that his clients were offered exposure to the best possible capital growth returns over the 3 to 5 year period within the vintage fine wine market.

Since 2006, our clients have seen an average return of 18.5% annually, on wines that we have recommended.

In 2011, Global Wine Investments Ltd was formed , fine wine portfolio managers in the City of London, offering a bespoke service to a wider range of private investors. We specialise in advising on all aspects of fine wine investment, from acquisition, portfolio development and management.

We believe fine wine adds stability, diversity and strong long-term growth to any investment portfolio. We make the process as simple and easy as possible, and take care of all your needs from initial acquisition to storage, regular market updates and resale to release your capital.

We have over 30 years combined experience in identifying and sourcing the best fine wines which have shown a fantastic track record of performing throughout the past decade.

With our expertise, we can assist in generating and expanding our clients wealth, during these adverse market conditions.
